resources.string:
Hi My name is Samuel Clavijo.

I am a Systems Engineer and with a Master in Business Administration from Colombia, 

I worked with several Databases Management System (DBMS) a text-based procedurally oriented programming languages including: 
FoxBase, FoxPro 

I collaborated as a Software Engineer with 5 analyst programmers under my lead, for EMCALI, a Utility Company in Cali, Colombia using Oracle Database, Oracle Forms, Designer, Developer 2000 and SQL. Then I moved to US in Year 2000, after I started teaching Microsoft Office and Windows in a vocational school. During that time I was learning by myself Java. 

In 2012 I started working on Union City Board of Education as a Math Teacher on the Union City High School, then on 2019 I was offered the position of Computer Science Teacher in Jose Marti STEM Academy, position which I am holding now,also I am the Coding Club advisor, I learned some Python and Kotlin during that time by myself. 

 in 2018 I took a scholarship with Udacity and Google, then I was selected to do the Android Basics Nanodegree which I finished. 

Now I am doing the Android Developer Nanodegree and I will be looking for a part time position on that field.
